name: SKProductStorePromotionController
desc: A product promotion controller for customizing the order and visibility of in-app purchases per device.

items.name: func fetchStorePromotionOrder(completionHandler: (([SKProduct], Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Reads the product order override that determines the promoted product order on this device.

items.name: func update(storePromotionOrder: [SKProduct], completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Overrides the promoted product order on this device.

items.name: func fetchStorePromotionVisibility(for: SKProduct, completionHandler: ((SKProductStorePromotionVisibility, Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Reads the visibility setting of a promoted product in the App Store for this device.

items.name: func update(storePromotionVisibility: SKProductStorePromotionVisibility, for: SKProduct, completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Updates the visibility of the product on the App Store, per device.

items.name: enum SKProductStorePromotionVisibility
items.desc: The visibility settings that determine if an in-app purchase is visible on a device.

items.name: class func `default`() -> Self
items.desc: Returns the default product store promotion controller.
